Transparency.justification: Score = 1 because 2 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Liberty Mutual Insurance establishes artificial intelligence collaboration with MIT
relevantSources.summary: Announces $25M MIT partnership for AI research including transparency and risk-aware decision making.

relevantSources.title: Next-generation predictive modeling
relevantSources.summary: Details predictive modeling capabilities using 200 million data points for transparent claims processes.

Transparency.findings: Liberty Mutual's partnership with MIT and internal documentation provide specific details on efforts to ensure transparency in AI, including transparent modeling and decision-making processes. These sources demonstrate a commitment to making AI systems understandable to both regulators and customers.

relevantSources.summary: MIT partnership explicitly states goal to develop methods to make AI systems fair and secure.

relevantSources.title: MIT and Liberty Mutual Launch Collaboration
relevantSources.summary: Details $25M collaboration research topics including developing fair AI systems for insurance industry.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Liberty Mutual's collaboration with MIT specifically addresses fairness and bias mitigation in AI, with research focused on developing fair and secure AI systems for insurance applications. These sources provide concrete evidence of active work on bias mitigation methods.

relevantSources.summary: Partnership focuses on developing transparent AI systems and risk-aware decision making methods.

Explainability.findings: The MIT partnership documentation shows Liberty Mutual is actively researching explainable AI, with explicit goals to make algorithms transparent and understandable for customers and regulators. These sources confirm a concrete focus on explainability in AI development.

Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: Liberty Mutual demonstrates concrete human oversight through its legal department's human-in-the-loop practices and a governance framework with a responsible AI working group. summary.overallFindings: Liberty Mutual Insurance Company demonstrates comprehensive, public-facing responsible AI practices across all seven core pillars. The company provides detailed and verifiable evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments, notably through its major MIT partnership and internal governance structures. No significant gaps were identified, and Liberty Mutual's approach reflects a mature, well-documented responsible AI program. Their public disclosures and collaborative initiatives position them as a leader in responsible AI within the insurance sector.
